LanguageData.OE_SyntheriusPack.label: compressed syntherius
LanguageData.OE_SyntheriusPack.description: A batch of syntherius hermetically compressed into a special container for safe transportation and storage.\n\nFor further use, be sure to decompresse it.
LanguageData.OE_ArachnaCore.label: arachna core
LanguageData.OE_ArachnaCore.description: A hyper-advanced computer core containing the AI persona of the Arachne Queen. It's unknown how the Crimson Arachna Cult got it, but with proper tuning it has huge potential.
LanguageData.OE_ArachnaCore.comps.CompAnalyzableUnloc: By studying the Arachna Core, {PAWN_labelShort} has acquired the insight needed for the research project(s) {RESEARCH}.\n\nYour researchers can now use research benches to begin researching how to actually use the technology.
Can be analyzed by a colonist.
LanguageData.OE_SyntheriusOfSin.label: Syntherius of Sin
LanguageData.OE_SyntheriusOfSin.description: A fragment of a strange Syntherius used at the heart of the Fallen Legion.
LanguageData.OE_SyntheriusOfSin.comps.CompAnalyzableU: By studying the Syntherius of Sin, {PAWN_labelShort} has acquired the insight needed for the research project(s) {RESEARCH}.\n\nYour researchers can now use research benches to begin researching how to actually use the technology.
Can be analyzed by a colonist.
LanguageData.OE_UnstableStone.label: ustable power stone
LanguageData.OE_UnstableStone.description: An unstable power stone from legends. By studying it, you can be able to stabilize and use its power.
LanguageData.OE_UnstableStone.comps.CompAnalyzableUnl: By studying the Ustable Power Stone, {PAWN_labelShort} has acquired the insight needed for the research project(s) {RESEARCH}.\n\nYour researchers can now use research benches to begin researching how to actually use the technology.
Can be analyzed by a colonist.
LanguageData.OE_PherocoreBiophormids.label: biophormids pherocore
LanguageData.OE_PherocoreBiophormids.description: A pheromone controlling micro-organ. It is necessary to construct certain types of insectoid hives. Pherocores have been embedded deep into the brains of geneline leaders which allowed ancient civilizations to control the hives.\n\nThis pherocore belongs to the Biophormids geneline, artificially created from a blend of insectoid genes across the galaxy and advanced technologies, known for their humanoid forms and remarkable intelligence.
LanguageData.OE_PherocoreBiophormids.comps.CompUsable: Use {0_labelShort} to increase the size of the hive
LanguageData.OE_EGOSeed_Elder_Direwolf.label: mutated EGO seed – Elder Direwolf
LanguageData.OE_EGOSeed_Elder_Direwolf.description: Once the seed of an EGO tree, this specimen mutated under unknown conditions after entering the body of an Elder Direwolf. It sprouted within the host, forming an amalgam symbiosis. It can no longer be used to grow an EGO tree.
LanguageData.OE_EGOSeed_Elder_Raptor.label: mutated EGO seed – Elder Raptor
LanguageData.OE_EGOSeed_Elder_Raptor.description: Once the seed of an EGO tree, this specimen mutated under unknown conditions after entering the body of an Elder Raptor. It sprouted within the host, forming an amalgam symbiosis. It can no longer be used to grow an EGO tree.
LanguageData.OE_EGOSeed_Elder_Ogren.label: mutated EGO seed – Elder Ogren
LanguageData.OE_EGOSeed_Elder_Ogren.description: Once the seed of an EGO tree, this specimen mutated under unknown conditions after entering the body of an Elder Ogren. It sprouted within the host, forming an amalgam symbiosis. It can no longer be used to grow an EGO tree.
LanguageData.OE_EGOSeed_Elder_Tionant.label: mutated EGO seed – Elder Tionant
LanguageData.OE_EGOSeed_Elder_Tionant.description: Once the seed of an EGO tree, this specimen mutated under unknown conditions after entering the body of an Elder Tionant. It sprouted within the host, forming an amalgam symbiosis. It can no longer be used to grow an EGO tree.
